name: Mary Poppins Returns was lovely. Both the leads (Blunt, Miranda) did a fantastic job. There were moments of delight, especially the Royal Doulton Music Hall. But, the music was just good, not great. It falls short of the original.

content.html: Mary Poppins Returns was lovely. Both the leads (Blunt, Miranda) did a fantastic job. There were moments of delight, especially the Royal Doulton Music Hall. But, the music was just good, not great. It falls short of the original.
content.value: Mary Poppins Returns was lovely. Both the leads (Blunt, Miranda) did a fantastic job. There were moments of delight, especially the Royal Doulton Music Hall. But, the music was just good, not great. It falls short of the original.

summary: The original is legendary, so that's a high bar.

content.html: The original is legendary, so that's a high bar.
content.value: The original is legendary, so that's a high bar.

summary: Agreed! I think what they were able to do was impressive. It was a worthy follow-up, just needed some help with the music. I’m surprised that they didn’t have Lin-Manuel Miranda write the music. I have a feeling that would have put it over the top!

content.html: Agreed! I think what they were able to do was impressive. It was a worthy follow-up, just needed some help with the music. I’m surprised that they didn’t have Lin-Manuel Miranda write the music. I have a feeling that would have put it over the top!

summary: @cleverdevil I think we're all spoiled by the Julie Andrews portrayal and music, and will probably be unsatisfied as a result with anything that tries to fill those shoes.

content.html: @cleverdevil I think we're all spoiled by the Julie Andrews portrayal and music, and will probably be unsatisfied as a result with anything that tries to fill those shoes.
content.value: @cleverdevil I think we're all spoiled by the Julie Andrews portrayal and music, and will probably be unsatisfied as a result with anything that tries to fill those shoes.

summary: @arush living up to the magic of Julie Andrews is near impossible. That said, I don’t think the performers were an issue. Emily Blunt did an amazing job, as did Lin-Manuel Miranda. The music itself was the main issue for me: it was good, but not great!

content.html: @arush living up to the magic of Julie Andrews is near impossible. That said, I don’t think the performers were an issue. Emily Blunt did an amazing job, as did Lin-Manuel Miranda. The music itself was the main issue for me: it was good, but not great!
